alert.note: Alert for Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. Lawrence County through 730 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Fowler, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gouverneur, Fowler, Edwardsville, Richville, North Gouverneur, Balmat, West Fowler, and East De Kalb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
